data.title: DOWN HOME GOSPEL â€“ WGGS TV
data.text:
SATURDAYS 9:00PM

Down Home Gospel showcases all types of Southern Gospel Music, from the classics to contemporary. Join us Saturday Nights on WGGS TV at 9PM, tune in on the web, or ask your local station to pick us up.

Down Home Gospel Live

Since 1993, Down Home Gospel has been a mainstay in Christian Gospel television entertainment. Hosted by the dynamic team of Troy and Tammy Burhs, it features nationally known music groups such as The McKameys, The Crabb Family, and The Cathedrals, local groups such as The Inspirations, The Palmetto State Quartet, and Mountain Faith, and maybe your Southern Gospel or Bluegrass group as well! If you would like your group to appear on Down Home Gospel, or if you wish to request or suggest a group, write us at:

Down Home Gospel

PO Box 1616

Greenville SC 29602

Be sure to join Troy and Tammy Burns every Saturday night for fun, fellowship, and above all, great Southern Gospel music at 9 PM on WGGS TV 16.1!

Be sure to follow us on facebook!
